alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 7:24AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LEAKE...SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA AND SCOTT COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM CST... At 723 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mcadams to near Ludlow to 6 miles north of Johns. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kosciusko, Morton, Lena, Branch, Mcadams, Ludlow, Forkville, and Thomastown around 730 AM CST. Carthage, Redwater, and Singleton around 735 AM CST. Tuscola around 740 AM CST. Pulaski and Smyrna around 745 AM CST. Hillsboro, Standing Pine, and Renfroe around 750 AM CST. Forest, Walnut Grove, and Harperville around 755 AM CST. Ethel and Zama around 800 AM CST. Steele around 805 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
